description: Allmedi Coin (AMDC) is a virtual currency for payment transactions. The payment service will be established first in the Philippines and will be expanded to other countries. AMDC will use AMDC P-Token, a stable coin on private network, as a good practical solution. In short, AMDC network is a hybrid solution of AMDC erc20 token and AMDC P-token.
name: Allmedi Coin
